website_summaries.verdict: A quality duffel bag with features that athletes and gym rats are sure to appreciate. Ideal for sports, gym, or everyday use.
pros: Ample space for gym gear or approximately a week of clothing
Plenty of compartments for smaller items
Zippered bottom compartment keeps shoes and dirty clothes contained
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Might be a few inches too big to be accepted as a carry-on

customer_reviews.title: Enough space
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bike gym bag. May compartments including a bottom shoe compartments. I work out at work during work so this bag made it easy for me to pack 5 pairs of workout clothes for the week.
customer_reviews.author: Shemeeka Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it, it’s just enough space for a 3-6 day trip
customer_reviews.author: Quaid

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good for hoops players
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag and all of the compartments. I wish it was about 2 inches taller and 3 inches wider so I could not struggle to zip the bag with my shoes and bball inside. I really like it though
customer_reviews.author: Casey R Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great size bag-great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and great timing! I have it wrapped and under the tree. Hopefully my fiancé loves and it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend, he loves it has plenty of room, good material.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Gym bag perfect
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect. The color is perfect. This was a good purchase. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Felice

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: My favorite gym bag! Simple but with lots of features. I love the compartment on the bottom to put my dirty/wet clothes after working out.
customer_reviews.author: AKR

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the bag in the picture...Does not have the bottom zippered pocket and the Nike shoulder pad for the strap. I don’t like buying from a false photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag To Use
customer_reviews.text: This bag is kinda big for me to carry but thats to be expected. Otherwise this bag is great to use. I use it for when I'm traveling and it fits a good amount of stuff like, clothes and a few other products I use. I'd suggest to buy it if you want to have a guym bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a grand who plays a lot of sports. She loved it! Lots of small and large pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda R.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Purchased it for a gift...he loved it! Uses it as a gym/over nighter. Very practical.
customer_reviews.author: WeeZie

customer_reviews.title: nice design, flimsy bag
customer_reviews.text: thin and flimsy bag came with a rip. will return and get a different bag. looks cute though.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Nike Training Bag
customer_reviews.text: We really liked the Nike training bag lightweight but has a lot of space for shoes etc.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Ouimette

customer_reviews.title: High-quality Gym Bag
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size. It was described as medium but looked like a large.
customer_reviews.author: natasha s.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson, perfect size for all of his items.
customer_reviews.author: Connie j

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: Product is easily damaged. Used for a weekend and the front of the bag ripped from the seam.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Terrible small design
customer_reviews.text: Poor design causes very limited space in the overall bag. Not a normal duffle bag. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Pro

customer_reviews.title: Pockets and shoe storage!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent , durable and good sized duffel bag! I like the zipper compartment at the bottom for shoes and it has plenty of pockets to separate anything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: Great bags. I bought it for my grandchildren. they loved it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It’s a gym bag to replace one I had before. Lots of room and padded strap. My old Nike bag had a hard piece of plastic on the bottom which provided further support but after 10 years of use, fell apart. This lacks the plastic so it sags a bit more. Overall, it does the job..
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Mah

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag
customer_reviews.text: Had this bag in college, lost it, bought it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ferrigno

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bag
customer_reviews.text: This was gift for my little brother for his jiu jitsu class and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: OahuzFinest

customer_reviews.title: Nike duffle
customer_reviews.text: I needed a sturdy duffle-for weekend trips, sports, etc. and this one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Small, but can pack a decent amount of stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Great gym bag easy to carry. Able to stuff about two work pants, 1 work shirt, work boots, soap, towel, toothbrush. Hasn’t ripped yet so it’s good for the price. Worth it
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good product just too BIG
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium sized bag, was not expecting a extra-large bag. I could fit my whole garage with this thing. Overall I’m satisfied with this product, except the size.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Reyes

customer_reviews.title: A Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bag for my brother. He was happy with it! I was surprised how big it was and roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Bevvy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, moderate price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag! Took it for a lot of traveling back and forth and it was easy to carry and can fit all those small plane/train/boat baggage compartments
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag and many cool compartments! Bag is much bigger than it appears in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Shane S.

customer_reviews.title: Spacious bag
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved the bag! It was very spacious and he likes how he can adjust the strap. Great bag for travel or even for the gym!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this bag for his sports, it’s a very nice size bag and strong enough to hold his stuff for basketball and football
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as depicted in photos
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my husband- he loved it

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bag... Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag... Perfect for my Basketballs and workout gear...

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and it has a lot of space so I can carry all the thing I need
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: My favorite gym bag I’ve had. Nice, sturdy, and not complicated with a bunch of compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Good size for a variety of used.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice size bag. Bought 3 of them for my 3 grandsons. Can be used as a gym bag or an overnight/weekend bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Houchins

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my grandson for christmas. He was very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: way to small, other than that its a cool bag i guess

customer_reviews.title: nike shoulder bag
customer_reviews.text: i love amazon prime deliver fast and quick item looks great and new

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great all around bag. Not too big, but plenty of room for my son's basketball gear. Seems durable, too

customer_reviews.title: Pleased customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and he loved it it’s a really nice size

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It’s great has a lot of spaces and the material is amt

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: It was in super good condition and my boyfriend loved it! Super durable too!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Campise

customer_reviews.title: I was able to have his name put on this bag
customer_reviews.text: this bag is the perfect size my boyfriend loved it

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good authentic bag. Got here in 2 days. Nice quality 🔥

customer_reviews.title: Very nice travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than pictures, excellent travel bag. Probably would recommend the small bag if only to carry items the gym
customer_reviews.author: j.c.s.

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Attentive greeting, satisfied with the purchase, I arrive as we expected, in short excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo B.

product_meta.title: Nike Brasilia Training Medium Duffle Bag
product_meta.description: The durable Nike Brasilia Duffle Bag features a spacious main compartment for all your gear so you can feel prepared. Padded should strap make carrying it comfortable, and multiple exterior pockets provide quick-grab convenience.
feature_bullets: NIKE DUFFLE BAG: The Nike Duffle Bag features spacious compartments for all your gear so you can feel prepared, especially when on the go.
VERSITILE STORAGE: The large main compartment of the gym duffle bag zips shut for secure storage. Additional zippered bottom compartment can hold your shoes or separate wet and dry clothing.
ADJUSTABLE STRAP: The adjustable shoulder strap creates a customizable carrying experience with the men's and women's duffle bag. Padding in the straps allows you to carry the sack with comfort.
DURABLE BOTTOM: The bottom of the bag is coated with a water-resistant barrier. The durable duffle bags for men and women are sure to last from home to practice, day after day.
DUFFLE BAG: Imported, spot clean, dimensions: 25" L x 12" W x 12" H, fabric: 100% polyester
